attributes.action: Install crash barriers on the A322 to preent drivers performing u-turns
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The A322 carriageway has no crash barriers on the central reservation to prevent drivers from peforming u-turns at peak times. 

Drivers perform a u-turn and stay in the left hand lane of the West End bound carriageway at slow speeds impeding traffic that is approaching at 60mph.

One accident has caused 3 deaths as a result of this type of manoeuvre, this needs to be done to prevent others from meeting the same fate.
